burlap.behavior.singleagent.planning.stochastic.montecarlo.uct

Class UCTStateNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.behavior.singleagent.planning.stochastic.montecarlo.uct.UCTStateNode

  • public class UCTStateNode
extends java.lang.Object
    UCT State Node that wraps a hashed state object and provided additional state statistics necessary for UCT.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

      • UCTStateNode

        public UCTStateNode(HashableState s,
            int d,
            java.util.List<Action> actions,
            UCTActionNode.UCTActionConstructor constructor)
        Initializes the UCT state node.
        Parameters:
        s - the state that this node wraps
        d - the depth of the node
        actions - the possible OO-MDP actions that can be taken
        constructor - a UCTActionNode factory that can be used to create ActionNodes for each of the actions.
